name: GoalBot
description: Discord goal bot for tracking goals

tasks.name: command-skeletons
tasks.description: Make skeleton functions for all commands
notes:
Ensure that propogating global commands
that have been edited do not create 
duplicate commands.

tasks.name: prevent-sql-injections
tasks.description: make sure no sql injections can be made
notes:
entering quotes cuases error, see if can
be sanitized

tasks.name: learn-python-unit-testing
tasks.description: Learn how to unit test in python

tasks.name: date-conversion
tasks.description:
Have a function that converts mm/dd/yyyy to yyyy-mm-dd
for sql tables and vise-versa

tasks.name: autoincrement-db-id
tasks.description:
Replace the name field in the goals table of the
db to an int value that auto increments according
to the notes on whiteboard.

tasks.name: async-function-calls
tasks.description:
Research if functions calls within an async function
should be async or not
